mapper.insert: insert into product_sample_need (id, name, begin_time, end_time, status, relation_sample_product_limit, image, supplier_service_category, business_unit_id, owner_user_id, created_by, gmt_created, modified_by, gmt_modified, detail ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{relationSampleProductLimit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplierServiceCategory,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{businessUnitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ownerUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifiedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{detail,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )

mapper.select: select a.*,b.*,c.*,d.*,f.* from product_sample_need a left join product_sample_need b on a.id = b.id left join product_sample_need c on b.id = c.id left join product_sample_need d on c.id = d.id left join product_sample_need f on d.id = f.id

insert into product_sample_need(id, name, begin_time, end_time, status, relation_sample_product_limit, image, supplier_service_category, business_unit_id, owner_user_id, created_by, gmt_created, modified_by, gmt_modified, detail ) values
